The goal of startrek is to access Star Trek transcripts in a `data.frame` for easy analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub:

``` r
devtools::install_github("tylurp/startrek")
```

Or, just download the data to disk from the data folder in this repository.

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to access a transcript dataset:

```{r example}
library(startrek)
library(tibble)

as_tibble(tng$`The Inner Light`)
```

All available datasets can be shown by running:

```{r}
str(names(tng))
```
